Title: Ink Master
Description:
The kith of Loamm request the skills of a scribe! We niffen have heard of the powerful magical writings you produce on the surface, and wish to smell your handiwork with our own noses!

Our Chief Chiseler, Miss Scridorsa, has requested a sample of both pigment and runestone be brought below.

Make a delivery to Loamm as soon as you can, won't you?
ObjectivesText: Deliver Shimmering Pigments and Chilled Runes to Scridorsa the Chiseler in Loamm.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the items to Scridorsa the Chiseler in Loamm
